Oakland.Ren\u00e9 C. Davidson Courthouse:
The René C. Davidson Courthouse is a courthouse, part of the Alameda County Superior Court system. The courthouse is located in Oakland, California, USA. It is adjacent to Lake Merritt.


== History ==
The building was built in 1934 on the edge of Lake Merritt, originally housing the entirety of the Alameda County Superior Court system.
